meanings.sent1: The house had an adobelike appearance with its earthy tones.
meanings.sent2: The adobelike walls blended well with the desert landscape.
meanings.sent3: The adobelike texture of the cake made it look like a miniature clay house.
meanings.sent4: Her skin, adobelike in color, glowed under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The adobelike structure stood out against the green surroundings.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to adobe.
meanings.sent1: The adobelike material was perfect for the eco-friendly project.
meanings.sent2: The artist used adobelike colors to create a rustic feel in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The adobelike furniture added a touch of warmth to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her adobelike voice was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The adobelike aroma of the stew filled the kitchen with a comforting scent.

meanings.definition: In a manner similar to adobe.
meanings.sent1: She mixed the ingredients adobelike, creating a thick paste.
meanings.sent2: The paint was applied adobelike, giving the wall a textured finish.
meanings.sent3: He danced adobelike, moving gracefully across the floor.
meanings.sent4: The car moved adobelike through the rough terrain.
meanings.sent5: The curtains swayed adobelike in the gentle breeze.
